artistic.Definition: Being able to paint, write music, etc.; creative

shallow.Definition: not deep; a small distance between the lowest and highest point

simulate.Definition: to look, feel, or behave like something; to copy

simulation.Definition: a copy; a method that is used to study and analyze the characteristics of the real world

sketch.Definition: a drawing made quickly that lacks detail

slot.Definition: a long narrow opening, into which you put or fit something

span.Definition: the amount of time something lasts

specimen.Definition: an example of something, especially of a plant or an animal; a small amount of blood or urine

spectrum.Definition: the wavelengths of colors from red to violet

sphere.Definition: a round 3D object. e.g. a ball

spontaneous.Definition: something that happens on its own, seemingly without cause

stack.Definition: To put one thing on top of another e.g. books

stadium.Definition: very large building with a sports field and rows of seats all around that is used for various events

stance.Definition: a position or opinion that is stated to the public

stereotype.Definition: an idea or belief about what someone or something is like, often unfair or untrue

straightforward.Definition: easy to do or understand; not complicated

strand.Definition: something that is plaited or twisted as a rope-like length

stripe.Definition: a long, thin part of something which is a different color from the parts beside it

subjective.Definition: the use of personal feelings and opinions, rather than facts

syndrome.Definition: a group of signs and symptoms that accompany a disease

synthesis.Definition: building something complex from simple parts

thesis.Definition: a long essay; a position taken in an argument supported by a set of reasons

thread.Definition: a long, very thin, soft material used to join or make cloth

threshold.Definition: a level or point at which something would start or stop happening.

thumb.Definition: the short, thick finger on the side of your hand

transplant.Definition: a medical operation in which a new organ is placed inside a patient's body

trauma.Definition: a very severe or upsetting experience

triangle.Definition: a closed shape with three straight sides

tropical.Definition: hot and humid; near to the equator

tumor.Definition: a mass of abnormal cells that develops when cancerous cells divide and grow uncontrollably

undermine.Definition: to weaken or destroy something secretly and usually slowly

upward.Definition: moving toward a higher point or position

utilize.Definition: to use something practically for a particular purpose

vein.Definition: one of the little tubes that return blood from the body to the heart

verbal.Definition: using speech, rather than being written

vertical.Definition: a line going up/down; not horizontal

vitamin.Definition: a substance that is healthy for your body and can be found in foods or taken as a medicine

abdominal.Definition: Concerned with the abdomen or stomach

aggregate.Definition: a sum total amount of something

altitude.Definition: the height of something above sea level

analogy.Definition: comparison of things based on their similarity

antibiotic.Definition: concerning medicine that is used to fight certain diseases

antibody.Definition: a defense provided by the body against disease

appendix.Definition: additional information at the end of a document

applause.Definition: the sound made by clapping a performance or speech

axis.Definition: a line about which a rotating body, such as the earth, turns.

bracket.Definition: a 90 degree piece of metal used to support a wall shelf

coefficient.Definition: a number multiplied by a variable in an algebraic expression.

composite.Definition: made of more than one different part

cone.Definition: a 3D shape with a circular base; a part of the eye

cue.Definition: a word or action during a stage play to tell an actor to speak

cylinder.Definition: a shape or object with flat, circular ends and long, straight sides

degrade.Definition: to treat someone without respect; to reduce in amount or strength

delta.Definition: the place a river divides before entering a larger body of water

deviation.Definition: not standard or normal; in statistics: the difference between one of a set of values and some fixed value, usually the mean of the set.

diagnostic.Definition: to do with finding out the cause of a problem

diffusion.Definition: the movement of light in many directions

dilute.Definition: to mix; to reduce in strength, concentration, quality or purity

dominance.Definition: the state of being more powerful, successful, or important than others

dye.Definition: a liquid that colors hair or cloth

ecology.Definition: the study of plants, animals, people, and their environments

elastic.Definition: able to return to original shape or size after stretching

elasticity.Definition: the ability to stretch easily and then quickly return to the original shape

embed.Definition: to place or set inside rock, etc

erase.Definition: to remove written information or information on a computer memory

fungus.Definition: a group of plants that grow on dead materials and have no flowers, e.g. mushrooms

hawk.Definition: a large bird that gets its food by killing smaller birds and animals

incumbent.Definition: a person who holds a particular office or position

inferior.Definition: not as good as something else

kidney.Definition: an organ in the body that cleans the blood

mall.Definition: a large shopping center with many individual stores

maternal.Definition: having to do with being a mother

motif.Definition: a distinctive form, shape or figure in a design

mutation.Definition: a change; in genetics: any event that changes genetic structure

niche.Definition: a small area; a specialised business, job or activity

nitrogen.Definition: a colorless chemical element without a smell that forms most of the earth's atmosphere

node.Definition: an intersection or junction point in a network; a part on a plant where a new leaf grows

nominal.Definition: in name or thought but not reality

nutrient.Definition: a chemical, food, that animals and plants need to live, develop, and be healthy

offspring.Definition: the child of a person or the young of a plant or animal

orient.Definition: to focus your attention or efforts on something

overview.Definition: a description of the main features of something

paradigm.Definition: a set of ideas that are used for understanding or explaining something

parcel.Definition: a package or box wrapped in paper, a thing bigger than a letter that is sent in the mail

pest.Definition: an unwanted insect or small animal that eats plants or food supplies

pesticide.Definition: a chemical substance used to kill pests

plantation.Definition: a large area of plants, usually in a hot climate

pragmatic.Definition: dealing with problems in a reasonable, practical manner

qualitative.Definition: concerning how good something is, rather than quantity

quantum.Definition: the smallest unit or amount of energy

radar.Definition: a device that sends out radio waves for finding out the position of another object

replicate.Definition: to repeat something, such as an experiment, study or process

reservoir.Definition: a lake, usually artificial, where water is collected and stored for the use of a community or industry

scripture.Definition: the holy books of a particular religion

sediment.Definition: the material that settles to the bottom of a liquid

shuttle.Definition: a vehicle that carries passengers or items between two places

slab.Definition: a thick, flat slice of something

sniff.Definition: to smell by short intakes of air.

socialize.Definition: to teach people to behave in a way which is acceptable in their culture; to spend time with people

susceptible.Definition: at risk of developing a certain illness or problem

synthetic.Definition: not natural; made from artificial materials

thermal.Definition: with reference to some source of heat

tolerance.Definition: a willingness to let people do, say or believe what they wish, without judging or challenging them

undergraduate.Definition: a college student who is working toward his or her first degree

urine.Definition: yellow liquid waste from the body

valve.Definition: a device along a pipe that can either open and allow something to flow, or close and block it

vocabulary.Definition: the words that a person knows

wheat.Definition: a kind of grain that is used to make flour for bread

antiquity.Definition: an ancient period; something made a long time ago

binary.Definition: having two parts; using only 2 numbers, 1 and 0

chess.Definition: a game of strategy, for two players

chromosome.Definition: cell structures that carry the genetic material that is copied and passed to the next generation.

contour.Definition: the shape of the outside edge of something

corpus.Definition: a body; in linguistics: a body of words

deceive.Definition: to make someone believe something that is not true

deflection.Definition: the action of making something move in a different direction

denote.Definition: be a name or symbol for

dialect.Definition: a way of speaking a language that is used only in a particular area or by a particular group

encode.Definition: to change a message or information into code

epidemiology.Definition: the science of how diseases spread

fin.Definition: the flat, thin body parts of a fish that sticks out and helps guide it through water

finite.Definition: having limits; lasting for a limited time

flux.Definition: a state of flow and change

friction.Definition: the act of sliding two objects against each other

hepatitis.Definition: a disease of the liver that causes inflammation, yellow skin and a fever

irrigation.Definition: supplying land with water using pipes

liter.Definition: metric unit for measuring liquid or gas

locus.Definition: a place or location; in genetics: the location of a gene on a chromosome

mentor.Definition: an experienced or wise person who teaches or helps another person

mercury.Definition: a heavy, silver-white metal that is used in thermometers to measure temperature; a planet

metabolism.Definition: the chemical processes of the body in which food is converted to energy

mole.Definition: a small animal with dark fur that lives under the ground; a unit for measuring molecules

neuron.Definition: a nerve cell; the basic building block of the nervous system.

notation.Definition: a set of written signs or shapes that are used in music or mathematics

novice.Definition: a person with little or no experience in a particular activity, skill, or subject

oscillation.Definition: movement, from side to side at a steady speed; a frequent change in size, strength, or direction between two limits

partition.Definition: a wall, screen, or piece of glass used to separate one area from another

quiz.Definition: a game in which players answer questions on a specific topic

radius.Definition: a given area or a range around a certain point; a line from the center of a circle to its edge

receptor.Definition: a device that receives information; in physiology: a nerve ending that changes stimuli into impulses

repertoire.Definition: a collection of skills or accomplishments.

scroll.Definition: a long rolled piece of paper with writing on it; to move up and down a computer screen

sensory.Definition: referring to the five senses (hearing, sight, smell, taste and touch)

solvent.Definition: something that dissolves or can melt another substance

terminology.Definition: specific words and expressions used in a particular field

vector.Definition: a quantity that has both size and direction.

yeast.Definition: a single-celled fungi used to make bread and beer

amino.Definition: a substance that combines to form the structure of proteins

artifact.Definition: object made by humans, e.g. ancient tool

bilingual.Definition: being able to speak two languages well

chemotherapy.Definition: the treatment of diseases, such as cancer, using chemicals

confound.Definition: to confuse and greatly surprise someone, so that they are unable to explain a situation

dissection.Definition: the act or process of cutting something

dissertation.Definition: an in-depth paper submitted for a doctorate degree

entrant.Definition: a person who enters a contest

fetal.Definition: concerning a fetus, an unborn baby

gradient.Definition: a measure of how steep something is

innate.Definition: present in a person or animal from the time of birth

longitudinal.Definition: going from the top to the bottom of something

marrow.Definition: a soft, fatty tissue inside bones

morphological.Definition: the study of form and structure

morphology.Definition: the study of the forms and structures of plants, animals and words

neural.Definition: about the nerves or nervous system

phosphate.Definition: a salt or compound used to help grown plants

potassium.Definition: a common, soft, silvery white metal that is usually used for farming or industrial purposes

primer.Definition: a book that covers the basics of a subject; a kind of paint

proton.Definition: a very small part of an atom that has a positive electrical charge

soluble.Definition: can be mixed with a liquid, e.g. salt is soluble in water

substrate.Definition: a substance which a catalyst or enzyme has an effect on

syllabus.Definition: the teaching schedule for a course in a school or university

trajectory.Definition: the path followed by an object moving through space

transparency.Definition: the amount you can see through something

vowel.Definition: a speech sound; a, e , i, o, u and sometimes y

watershed.Definition: a period of time during which important, significant changes take place

algebra.Definition: mathematics using letters and symbols in place of some numbers

amplitude.Definition: the breadth, width or largeness of something

biodiversity.Definition: the variation in an environment, the number of different types of life found there

chloride.Definition: a chemical compound that is a mixture of chlorine and something else

consonant.Definition: a speech sound; any letter in the alphabet that is not a vowel.

cortex.Definition: the outer part of an organ or structure

inversion.Definition: a change in position of things so they become the opposite

postgraduate.Definition: graduate studying for a further degree

sneeze.Definition: to loudly blow air out of your nose or mouth in a sudden uncontrolled way

syntax.Definition: the study of a system, such as the system of words in a sentence

theorem.Definition: a statement that can be proved

aerosol.Definition: a container that sprays liquid under pressure

axiom.Definition: a statement that is accepted as true

calculus.Definition: a type of mathematics used for calculating such things as the slopes of curves

comma.Definition: mark showing a pause or list in a sentence

congruent.Definition: having the same shape and size

denominator.Definition: the bottom number in a fraction

equivalence.Definition: when something is equal to something else

exponential.Definition: a constant e raised to a power equal to a given expression: e.g. e3x is the exponential of 3x.

splice.Definition: act of connecting two pieces of rope or wire into one

oxidize.Definition: to convert (an element) into an oxide; combine with oxygen - to rust

parenthesis.Definition: one of two symbols ( and ), used in writing

semester.Definition: half a year in school or college

volition.Definition: the act of making a conscious choice

solute.Definition: a substance that has dissolved in a solvent and become part of the liquid, so that they form a solution

airplane.Definition: a machine that flies through the air

artwork.Definition: photographs or pictures in a printed publication

breakdown.Definition: when normal activity or behaviour stops

classroom.Definition: room in a school where lessons take place

feedback.Definition: a response to a message; information about a person's behavior

footnote.Definition: extra information at the bottom of a page

halfway.Definition: a middle point between two extremes

handout.Definition: a piece of paper with information, often given out before a presentation

homework.Definition: work that a student is given to do at home

layout.Definition: plan or design of something, e.g. of book page

lifestyle.Definition: the type of life that you have

lifetime.Definition: the time between birth and death

pathway.Definition: a path or way that you can walk

textbook.Definition: a book that is used to study

uplift.Definition: to make someone feel happier or more hopeful

wavelength.Definition: the size of a wave; a shared understanding

widespread.Definition: happening or existing in many places; affecting many people

workshop.Definition: a brief intensive course for a small group; emphasizes problem solving

micro.Definition: a prefix meaning 'very small', such as microchip

pi.Definition: the ratio of the circumference to the diameter of a circle; approximately equal to 3.14

pole.Definition: a long, narrow piece of metal or wood, that is used to hold or support something

super.Definition: of the highest quality; great; marvelous

headquarter.Definition: the main office of a company or organisation
